body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Learn about the Lassen Peak Eruptions               Share Lassen's geologic story               How does climate change affect the park?               Step back in history         Â    Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.    News Stay connected with the park through news releases, the park newspaper, and social media.   Photos & Multimedia  Explore the park from afar with photo galleries, webcams, audio tours, and e-tours.   Management View park regulations, project planning, and management plans including fire.    Nature Learn about Lassen's animals, plants, environmental factors, and natural features including volcanoes.    History & Culture Explore the Lassen Volcanic's rich human history.    Kids & Youth Find activities and information for young visitors including student resources, Junior Ranger Program, Chipmunk Club, and Volcano Club (for adults too); or learn about the park's youth camping program and new Volcano Adventure Camp slated to open August 2016.     Education Find lesson plans, plan your field trip, and discover park resources you can borrow as you use Lassen as your classroom.
title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Learn About the Park
